name: Production Status
query:
select 
	mr_item.production_order as "Production Order:Link/Production Order:100",
	mr_item.date as "Date:Date:100",
	mr_item.job_order_id as "Job Order No:Data:120",
	mr_item.process as "Process:Link/Process:100",
	mr_item.job_allocated as "Assigned Qty:Data:100",
	mr_item.completed_job as "Completed Qty:Data:100",
	mr_item.rejected_qty as "Rejected Qty:Data:100",
	mr_item.employee_name as "Employee:Link/Employee:100",
	mr_item.machine_no as "Machine:Link/Machine:100"
from
	`tabJob Card` mr, `tabJob Order Detail` mr_item
